item.title: Planar Data Classification with One Hidden Layer
item.description: For Week 3 of the Deep Learning Specialization, we move beyond logistic regression and build our first neural network â€” one with a single hidden layer. The task is to classify a toy flower-shaped dataset, which logistic regression cannot handle well.
